ygData.subject: Deepwater Gobs
ygData.msgSnippet: I WANT the lambent helm - and have the Mudwater Rune - so I need the Opoline Helm.  I recall a discussion of these some time ago - and the archive search
ygData.messageBody:
I WANT the lambent helm - and have the Mudwater Rune - so I need the Opoline Helm. I recall a discussion of these some time ago - and the archive search engine at www.onelist.com is basically useless (trust me - I tried...)

I do recall (and have heard from others on the server) that the problem of course is breaking the spawn; but I am looking for advice on what levels the party needs to be and other pulling techniques (does harmony or lament work, etc)

Thanks!

Slyde 33 of Xegony


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
